    <td><p>A string that describes the vulnerable package versions.
This string follows a basic syntax with a few forms.
+ <code>= 0.2.0</code> denotes a single vulnerable version.
+ <code>&lt;= 1.0.8</code> denotes a version range up to and including the specified version
+ <code>&lt; 0.1.11</code> denotes a version range up to, but excluding, the specified version
+ <code>&gt;= 4.3.0, &lt; 4.3.5</code> denotes a version range with a known minimum and maximum version.
+ <code>&gt;= 0.0.1</code> denotes a version range with a known minimum, but no known maximum</p></td>
  </tr>
</table>
